TopicTitle: Is it possible to create my own buildings?

Articles.Content:
Hello, is it possible to put extra buildings/structures on Kerbin or other celestial bodies?

Since there are easter eggs in the Kerbal system, and many more buildings than those on KSC, I was wondering how I would make buildings myself.

I'm thinking of making an ALS for the KSC runway, and if that actually works, some PAPI as well.

You can place object like you speak of with this

http://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/showthread.php/40374-WIP-KerbTown-v0-11-3-Beta-Place-static-buildings-cities-launch-sites-more!
PAPI is being created. Check this: http://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/showthread.php/41435-0-21-Runway-PAPI-array-Version-0-3
